article.title: Shadow Unmanned Aircraft Support Contract Modified
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: AAI Corporation, Hunt Valley, Maryland, was awarded a $77,311,855 cost-plus-incentive-fee and cost-plus-fixed-fee contract modification to support the Shadow Tactical Unmanned Aircraft Systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
